title: Bug 18934 - Scrollbars should be disabled in ImageAnalyzer example
OB: In the ImageAnalyzer example, the scrollbars are enabled and can be moved, but they do not have any effect. Even when a small image, like an icon, is opened, the scrollbars are present but do not perform any action.
EB: The scrollbars in the ImageAnalyzer example should be disabled when they do not serve any purpose. This will prevent confusion and avoid misleading users.
SR: To reproduce the issue:  1. Build F2 (20020602)Redhat 7.2, GTK2KDE 2.210(GTK2 only)  2. Open the ImageAnalyzer example.  3. Notice that the scrollbars are enabled and can be moved, but they do not have any effect, even when a small image is opened.
